website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Alcatel One Touch Idol 3 is an exceptional Android smartphone value that more than lives up to its lofty spec sheet.
cons: Merely average battery life and call quality

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Just outside of the warranty and the phone screen cracked whilst inside my trouser pocket. The phone was advertised as being reversible when taking calls but this feature never seemed to work well. It was whilst carrying out my own screen repair that I noticed the second microphone required for making reversible calls was entirely missing??????. Its very apparent that these phones are built to break the screen and Digitizer are poorly bonded so flexing of the screen puts undue pressure on the glass leading to premature failure. The phone is also very difficult to repair and i scratched the case removing the back. So would I recommend this phone absolutely not stick to a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbobbaldwin

customer_reviews.title: useage
customer_reviews.text: very slow software good sound very light weight easy use
customer_reviews.author: DjPapa

customer_reviews.title: Brought new, empty box
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on the fact the box was completely devoid of any phone when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks and feels. it is easier to grip comparing with some other 5.5 inch screen phones. the screen has quite good quality. The stereo sound is awesome thanks to the speakers at the both ends. The only drawback that I can mention here is that the sound volume is too loud even when it is only one step above mute. I hope it get fixed in the forthcoming OS update by Alcatel.
customer_reviews.author: Ali N.

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel One Touch Idole 5
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, from both speed, price, camera is splendid very good, had one last year and bought this one for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Mick S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap good spec phone
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got this phone for its amazing obviously not the best phone out there bit for the price it does me as a work phone sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Miss patricia patterson

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Waited weeks on product. Worked for about 5 days, now it's frozen. Screen stuck, very unhappy, as I saved up for this phone. Can't afford another one.
customer_reviews.author: vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Came with quality earphones which was a great bonus! Has been working fine ever since and I've been absolutely loving it, though it would be worth buying a screen protector and case too with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great smartphone, ultra clear screen
customer_reviews.text: A great smartphone, ultra clear screen, near stock android, don't be put off by a bit off bloat which you can remove anyway! No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone for under €300 by a mile
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a better phone than I expected Great 1080p screen Excellent speakers Very good camera And brilliant battery can easily get 5 to 6 hours screen on time
customer_reviews.author: ebjan

customer_reviews.title: Let down at the last minute, should have been 5 star ..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, massive screen, however, was advertised at a price, went to 'check out' to buy and £10 had been added to price also using on o2 and unable to get picture messaging, despite o2's best help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost android phone.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, for my family. Very happy with how quick the device is for the money (though I am sure in 6 months time there will be a better choice). The box the phone comes in is nice and definitely makes it feel like a special gift.
customer_reviews.author: Martin O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: ... know much about mobile phones but this one had great reviews and so far has been great
customer_reviews.text: Don't know much about mobile phones but this one had great reviews and so far has been great. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good (only small issue)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Only wish is that it was pure stock android and they pushed updates regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sending back my replacement today (this is a replacement from my original purchase) with the same problem. Jumps out of network and cannot find network again, will allow me on 4g network with data usage but unable to make calls. As this is the basic principle of the PHONE then this is unacceptable. Which is such a shame as I loved all the other features on the phone. Extremely disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: Well Iam not going into writing a long review on this phone, except you won't buy a better phone at this price point. But having saying that, Iam surprised and can't believe they made such a awesome phone for how cheap it is.All the other reviews say what I was going to say, but just go and buy it and feel the love!.Other phone company's out there should learn from how cheap and how high spec this device is for the money! Awesome stuff Alcatel on all levels, and look forward to future handsets!.😊
customer_reviews.author: Darren Haines

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised by this phone. Comfortable to hold, despite it's size, surprisingly thin, looks classy. Sound is absolutely brilliant, call quality is as good as the top phones ( I have owned both iPhone 6 & Galaxy S6 ) Screen is brilliant, crisp & clear. Honestly, for this price, you will not find a better phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cairns

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: The glass broke on the one I bought even though it was in a case and it was only a 2 foot fall on to laminate flooring, the screen shattered like an egg (it's not gorilla glass). A call to Alcatels repair service said having the glass and digitizer replaced would cost "around £90" which given the part can be bought retail for £17 is an absolute rinse. The phone itself is find so long as you handle with extra care, the screen and audio really are lovely and the battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: UTO1867

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful phone but I might have been unlucky with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't read my SD card and every now and then kept sending me back to lock screen, especially when using the google music app. Ordered a replacement and same thing happened! Beautiful phone but I might have been unlucky with a bad batch? Shame as it really is a nice looking phone with great price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone Pros-full HD bright screen,slim premium-looking form factor,v.good audio output,Sony sensor in camera,2+16 gig ram/storage,expandable storage-up to 128 gig.Running lollipop. Cons-cant preview photos in camera app,defaults to built in launcher after start/restarting,bloat installed-remove!Download Google now/Nova launcher,remove bloat and you've got yourself a super phone at a really keen price-bear in mind the specs aren't as good on the 4.7" version-get the 5.5".
customer_reviews.author: Silvadavid

customer_reviews.title: Nice device at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice android phone, if you're looking for something a bit different from the nexus and Galaxy line-up. Good battery life, good (though not award winning) camera and an almost stock android experience. Also of note, the service they provide for replacing cracked screens is surprisingly easy to use if you're in need of it, and reasonably priced. Given my experiences with the phone vs. The floor, I'd recommend getting a case - the lovely screen coming to the edge of the body and the not-plasticky-feeling back can make it feel a little slippery at times.
customer_reviews.author: absentbabinski

customer_reviews.title: Was good then wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: Was great for about 4 months or so then started to develop faults eg. When I put calls onto loudspeaker the person on the other end couldn't hear me. Other times when the call rang and I picked the phone up the screen would go blank meaning I couldn't answer the call! Poor show really.
customer_reviews.author: WeeJohn

customer_reviews.title: A good price but has too many flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen and loud speakers but extremely poor battery life, laggy, camera is awful and video camera is poor with terrible sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-ranger!
customer_reviews.text: Great little mid-ranger that will handle almost anything you throw at it! The dual speakers sound loud and amazing! Great screen with popping deep colours, battery is not bad at all for light/medium users but heavy users may need to charge it during the course of a day.
customer_reviews.author: Irishsmile

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the price range, feels and looks premium and has decent specs,good for average/basic phone users. Runs stock android; easy to operate, the best feature in my opinion is the display and speakers.Bought for younger sister who is more than happy with it. Overall good phone for most users,however if ur looking for a more powerful device with high end features and perfomance, this isnt the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy and strong
customer_reviews.text: When my wife lost hers she just wanted the same again. Easy to use, nice screen, light but still strong.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel One Touch Idol 3
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone .It is easy to use and far exceeds my expectations. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. Already aware that power button not in ideal position so not an issue. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. JBL sound and earphones good bonus. Perfect design. Fast
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Top smartphone for a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Alcatel one touch idol 3 as my First large phone. Excellent specification and performance, does 90% what a Samsung galaxy S6 can do without the gimicks for 30% of the price, need I say more? Buy this phone and you won't regret! Plenty of good reviews on the net, so just don't take my word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Smartjim

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be a great smart phone - perfect for a spare or one ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a great smart phone - perfect for a spare or one to give to one of my children to use (especially as they have already smashed the screen on their contract phones with over 12 months left on the contract). It is a good sized phone - not too big and has some good features within it. The camera is of good quality and I was impressed with the phone as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Broadhurst

product_meta.title: Alcatel ONETOUCH IDOL 3 (5.5) SIM-Free Smartphone – Dark Grey
product_meta.description:
TRUE TO LIFE MUSIC FEATURING JBL AUDIO - The Award-Winning JBL Audio with Clari-Fi Technology by Harman, IDOL 3 brings an amazing on-the-go music experience! With dual front-facing JBL stereo speakers, IDOL 3 packs professional audio quality for true-to-life sound. You can also create your own custom beats with the ONETOUCH Mix app, which lets you mix both local and streaming tracks to save and share with your friends.

 VIVID CINEMATIC COLOR WITH TECHNICOLORTM COLOR ENHANCE TECHNOLOGY - Backed by 100 years of cinematic experience, IDOL 3 has been specially tuned for leading color and image innovation through Technicolor Color Enhance technology, giving the IDOL 3 a vivid cinematic color experience right in the palm of your hand. Get a clear view of your pictures and videos from any angle, even in direct sunlight. 

 INDUSTRY LEADING CAMERA QUALITY - Whether you are taking a selfie or capturing any one of life's important moments, the IDOL 3 comes packed with a 13MP main camera and wide-angle 8MP front camera that will excite even the most passionate photophiles. The IDOL 3 also comes packed with a full-featured camera application, including time-lapse, HDR, panoramic and manual mode, so you have the power to create and capture the experiences you want to remember. 

 POWER PACKED PERFORMANCE - Powered by an Octa-Core Qualcomm SnapdragonTM 615 processor, the IDOL 3 delivers ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity to help keep up with your fast paced life. Get lost in stunning HD video and console-quality gaming, made all the more realistic with 5.1 surround sound. 

 AWARD-WINNING EXPERIENCE - Live your life unlocked with the award-winning IDOL 3 from ALCATEL ONETOUCH. Recognized for delivering a high-quality, crisp viewing experience, slim, elegant design and unique features like a fully reversible user-interface, the IDOL 3 has all the features you need to enjoy every moment with your smartphone.

BOX CONTAINS
Alcatel Onetouch Idol 3
Aero Case
User Manual
Mains Charger
feature_bullets: 13 mega-pixel main camera, and 8 mega-pixel front camera
Micro SD slot supporting up to 128GB
